hooks.command: file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$file" == *.py ]]; then uv run ruff check --fix "$file" 2>/dev/null; uv run ruff format "$file" 2>/dev/null; fi
file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$file" == *.js ]] || [[ "$file" == *.jsx ]]; then npx --prefix frontend prettier --write "$file" 2>/dev/null; fi
file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$file" == *.dart ]]; then dart format "$file" 2>/dev/null; fi
